GET /api.description: serves a json representation of all available endpoints of a given api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all available topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all available articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article in relation to its id

exampleResponse.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comments in relation to an article, sorted as most recent first

comments.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!
comments.author: butter_bridge

exampleRequest.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes a comment by its id

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users
